sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO UWFDTB0301(MSG_ID, USER_ID, REGN_INF_ID, MSG_CN, REG_DT, INFO_ID, WRITER_ID) SELECT #msgId#, #userId#, ' ', #msgCn#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'),'', #writerId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B C) INDEX(A UWFDTB0301_IX03) INDEX(B UWFDTB0201_PK) INDEX(C UWFDTB0201_PK) */ A.MSG_ID, CASE WHEN B.USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||A.USER_ID || '['||A.WRITER_ID||']' WHEN B.USER_SR_CODE='001' AND A.USER_ID<>A.WRITER_ID THEN '@'||A.USER_ID || '['||A.WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||A.USER_ID END AS USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.MSG_CN, SUBSTR(A.REG_DT,1,12) AS REG_DT, A.INFO_ID, C.USER_IMG, A.WRITER_ID FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0201 B, UWFDTB0201 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.WRITER_ID=#value# AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.OPEN_YN='Y' AND C.USER_ID=(CASE WHEN A.USER_ID=A.WRITER_ID OR A.WRITER_ID IS NULL THEN A.USER_ID ELSE A.WRITER_ID END) ORDER BY A.REG_DT DESC

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B C) INDEX(A UWFDTB0101_IX01) INDEX(B UWFDTB0301_IX01) INDEX(C UWFDTB0201_PK) INDEX(D UWFDTB0201_PK) USE_NL(C D) */ B.MSG_ID, CASE WHEN C.USER_SR_CODE='002' THEN 'ⓜ'||B.USER_ID || '['||B.WRITER_ID||']' WHEN C.USER_SR_CODE='001' AND B.USER_ID<>B.WRITER_ID THEN '@'||B.USER_ID || '['||B.WRITER_ID||']' ELSE '@'||B.USER_ID END AS USER_ID, B.REGN_INF_ID, B.MSG_CN, SUBSTR(B.REG_DT,1,12) AS REG_DT, B.INFO_ID, B.WRITER_ID, D.USER_IMG FROM UWFDTB0101 A, UWFDTB0301 B, UWFDTB0201 C, UWFDTB0201 D WHERE A.SUB_USER_ID=#value# AND A.MST_USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.USER_ID=C.USER_ID AND D.USER_ID=(CASE WHEN B.USER_ID=B.WRITER_ID OR B.WRITER_ID IS NULL THEN B.USER_ID ELSE B.WRITER_ID END) ORDER BY B.REG_DT DESC

SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B) */ A.MSG_ID, CASE WHEN B.USER_SR_CODE = '002' THEN 'ⓜ' || A.USER_ID || '[@'|| A.WRITER_ID || ']' ELSE '@' || A.USER_ID END AS USER_INFO, A.USER_ID, A.REGN_INF_ID, A.MSG_CN, A.REG_DT, A.INFO_ID, A.WRITER_ID, C.USER_IMG, C.OPEN_YN FROM UWFDTB0301 A, UWFDTB0201 B, UWFDTB0201 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.MSG_ID=#msgId# AND A.USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND C.USER_ID = A.WRITER_ID
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO UWFDTB0201(USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NM, USER_SR_CODE, CN, WEB_URL, OPEN_YN, REG_DT, REG_INFO, REGN_INF_ID) VALUES(#userId#, 'MUSEUM', #userNm#, '002', #cn#, '', #openYn#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), '', #regnInfId#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT /*+ LEADING(A B C) INDEX(A UWFDTB0101_IX01) */ B.USER_ID, B.USER_NM, B.CN, SUBSTR(A.REG_DT,1,8) AS REG_DT, C.LATITUDE, C.LONGITUDE, C.COMPASS FROM UWFDTB0101 A, UWFDTB0201 B, CDCTCREGNINFO C WHERE 1=1 AND A.SUB_USER_ID=#value# AND A.MST_USER_ID=B.USER_ID AND B.USER_SR_CODE='002' AND B.REGN_INF_ID=C.REGN_INF_ID(+)
